title: Vigilante
description:
A new stand-alone dark romance from bestselling author Jessica Gadziala
I’m a bad guy.I do bad things. But I do them for the right reasons.That’s why I can sleep easy at night even with the smell of fresh blood still in my nostrils. One more scumbag off the streets. One more righting of a wrong.That was all my life was about.Until I came across her…** Triggers for this book can be found on my website under the "triggers" tab on the main navigation bar. Once at the "triggers" page, select "stand alones." **
author: Jessica Gadziala
